channel.title: Versity Recruiting [PI]
channel.description:
[font=verdana][size=18pt][b]VersityX[/b][/size] Hello, Coders will get rank in game if the choose to play and Web Designers. Well I'm making a new rsps and i can host it fine, I just need some coders. You have to know a little about caches and enough about Clients and Sources. Well i am using Ventrix base, It has all sorts of things like dung, dicing, vote4cash. A lot more. What I will need from the coder is to help me add in Loyalty, Netty Network, New home, Construction (Lot's of guides on this), Domination Tower, NEED FULL GODWARS.
0% done 50% done 100% done
Dung and some new items Summoning, Duel with Summoning Full Godwars Construction What we need: Web designer, In game coder.
Need 2x Ingame Coder: Need 1x Web Designer:
Needed:
Requirements For Web-Designer - Know how to use SMF: - Are u good at HTML and other codes: - Do you know How to add basic stuff: - Do you have time to do it: - 13+ and up age, are you? :
Requirements For Coder - You must know how to code. - Do you know how to make webclients: - In request make update regularly , can you : - 13+ and up age, are you? :
Add me on skype: Booga464[/font]
